name: Sole Survivor Bonus
description: Winning the game is the ultimate goal. The 'Sole Survivor' is the most vital category.

name: Final Three Bonus
description: Reaching the Final Three shows strategic success, endurance, and jury management.

name: Make the Merge
description: Making the merge is a critical milestone; it demonstrates social and tribal gameplay up to that point.

name: Successful Fire Making
description: The fire-making challenge directly determines the Final Three contestants in modern Survivor.

name: Individual Immunity
description: Winning individual immunity shows physical prowess and helps players avoid elimination in key moments.

name: Reward Challenge
description: Reward wins provide resources, morale boosts, and bonding opportunities, though not directly related to survival.

name: Hidden Immunity Idol
description: Playing a hidden immunity idol successfully can change the course of the game, offering massive strategic value.

name: Survive Tribal Council
description: Avoiding elimination at tribal councils is fundamental. Surviving one tribal contributes to long-term success.

name: Survive an Episode
description: Progressing through episodes gradually earns points, though it’s less impactful than major game milestones.

name: Tribal Immunity
description: Tribal immunity prevents a player’s tribe from facing elimination. It’s critical pre-merge but less impactful after.

name: Advantage
description: Finding or using an advantage can help, but it doesn't always guarantee safety or success.

name: Removal Penalty
description: Being voted out pre-merge or at any stage signifies a failure to progress. Penalties discourage poor performance.
